venue.name: Trinity College Life Sciences Center Auditorium

item.description:
Dinner and a Movie-La Cena y Una Pelicula
Trinity College Life Sciences Center Auditorium 
November 9


Join us at 6 p.m. at the Cave sandwich shop in the basement of Mather Hall on the Trinity College campus to chat in Spanish and then watch Biutiful, a drama directed by Mexican director Alejandro González Iñárritu and filmed in Barcelon, Spain. Biutiful stars Javier Bardem, and will be shown from 7 to 9 p.m.  in the Boyer Auditorium in the Life Sciences Center. There is parking behind the building. . The movie is free and followed by a discussion with the audience which is led by Trinity College staff. You can come for all or part of this event. Here is a link to the campus map http://www.trincoll.edu/pub/about/campusmap.htm


Questions, send Karen an email at kdwo543210@yahoo.com or call my cell 860 922 7997.

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Una Cena y Pelicula
